entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
